name: Haunted:Live
description:
It wasn't very famous, but it's been mentioned a lot recently.

It didn't seem like anything compared to all the rumors, but they realize that no one was filming a video at night in this haunted house.

They hope be the first record video came to ghost house tonight.

Haunted:Live is a single player psychological horror game.

you need for search and inspect on the quiet place alone to runaway from demonic symptom encount.

you can use for investigation method like PC, Book, Paper, demonic object to get hint and find unlock door, defeat demonic symptom.

Gameplay


Search & Inspect
You will explore the old ruins and face the records you can find there










Inventory & Journal





Save & Load / Checkpoint

You can Save and Load Game
if player reached checkpoint Game will be automaticaly save.


Multiple Endings / Collected Endinglist
9 Branched Ending
Once you finish the game, you can watch Collected Endinglist/Epilogue from Mainmenu



Xbox One Controller Support
